word:
Physicians and Nurses to Unite with Ministers 
                 in Soul-Saving Work. 

P. 220 '03 (Oct. 14 '03):-- 


     If right principles had been followed the relation existing between the physicians and their brethren would be exactly what the Lord designed it to be; but for years an effort has been put forth to make the medical missionary work the body. God designs that the medical missionary work shall be bound up with the gospel ministry.
